title: Creating AI: Part 2 of Making AI Podcast Hosts!
description:
Ever wanted to ask your favourite podcast host a question? Lets continue!

Check out our new tech moves with: https://internetfactory.substack.com/

Join the conversation and share your thoughts in the comments below.
_____________ 

Don't forget to like, comment & subscribe for so you don't miss out!

#benshapiro #technology #ai
